quoteText: Both you and Stack Overflow hereby irrevocably agree to the sole and exclusive personal jurisdiction of the Courts of the State of New York with respect to any action, suit, or proceeding brought by it or against it by the other party in connection with the Network or Services.
title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
